channel.title: Adobe Magento Open Source Security Bulletins
channel.description: Security bulletins and advisories for Adobe Magento Open Source
channel.copyright: Adobe Inc. - Republished for community awareness

item.title: APSB24-73: Security update available for Adobe Commerce
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Commerce and Magento Open Source. These updates resolve critical and important vulnerabilities.
Products: Adobe Commerce, Magento Open Source Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/magento/apsb24-73.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
